description:
Kei Kingdom’s Kirin, Keiki, chooses Yoko as the queen and Yoko visits Mt. Ho to be officially enthroned.  Keiki and Yoko stop by a palace where Kirins’ Shashinboku Tree (Unselfish Tree) is.  Yoko hears a story about the missing Kirin, Taiki, and Tai’s female monster which longed so much to find him.  Sugimoto is now back in Japan and hears a rumor of a boy named Kaname who was spirited away.  He turns out to be Taiki, the unusual Black Kirin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Umi, Meikyuu no Kishi - Isshou
The Sea of Wind, The Shore of The Maze - Chapter 1
風の海 迷宮の岸 一章
